npx hardhat run --network localhost scripts/deploy-redemption.mjs
export GNOSIS_SAFE_ADDRESS=0xf39fd6e51aad88f6f4ce6ab8827279cfffb92266
export AZR_ADDRESS=0x742d35Cc6634C0532925a3b844Bc454e4438f44e
export AZORA_RPC_URL=http://localhost:8545
# Deploy Redemption contract
npx hardhat node --port 8545 --hostname 0.0.0.0
# Start local blockchain
